roleset.name: remove
roleset.note: EXPUNGE-V NOTES: I also know of a usage which uses just the agent and"source", as in"John expunged his criminal record (of false charges)", which issimilar to 'empty' (which actually hasn't been framed yet). (from expunge.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Partly because of the show, Mr. Watson says, the district decided not to recommend Mrs. Yeargin for a first-time offenders program that *trace* could have expunged the charges and the conviction from her record.
